channel.title: Milestone 2 Requirements :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Fall 2022 offering of that course. For this milestone, you will be creating classes to represent the offerings of the “Dino Diner” - a prehistoric-themed fast-food franchise. These will be created within the Data project of the solution you accepted from GitHub classroom.
